name: Loop: New Reality
storyline:
ENTER A NEW REALITY: Slip on the revolutionary NEW REALITY headset and dive into the mesmerizing purple void, where your wildest dreams take shape! But there's more than meets the eye—beneath the surface lies a secret layer of the world waiting to be uncovered. Developers, unlock the exclusive PV headset within the game to reveal hidden assets and step boldly into uncharted realms!

DONT GET CORRUPTED: Scattered across the map are mysterious foreign assets that must be destroyed to stabilize the game. But beware—The Warden prowls relentlessly, hunting for its next prey. And here's the catch: your corruption—or health—persists throughout the entire game. Every move counts, so tread carefully and strategize wisely!

FIND SECRETS & LIES: This L00P is unlike any before it—now, you can interact with lifelike NPCs! These cutting-edge AI are so convincing, you might start to believe they’re real humans trapped in the game. Plus, uncover the secrets of Purple Void Inc. by collecting hidden emails at the start of each level, revealing fascinating backstories and the lives of its employees.

BREAK FREE: Maya’s ultimate mission is to shatter the endless L00P that binds her. By updating the game, obliterating anomalies, and gathering elusive data fragments, you’ll edge closer to the power needed to face The Warden. Only then can you seize your chance to defeat it and finally BREAK FREE!
summary: A VR game play tester finds herself locked in a NEW REALITY! Slip on the revolutionary NEW REALITY headset and dive into the mesmerizing purple void. But beware—The Warden prowls relentlessly, hunting for its next prey.
